#summary One-sentence summary of this page.

=Inro=
PID is one of the most commonly used control algorithms in FIRST robotics. It is a basic control algorithm that takes into account proportional error, integrated error, and derivative error to provide a smooth control response for the robot.

=Descriptions and Papers=
 * [http://team358.org/files/programming/PIDControlTheory_rev3.pdf Paper from 2006 season on PID control loops - Sample Code is written in C]
 * [http://saba.kntu.ac.ir/eecd/pcl/download/PIDtutorial.pdf a good presentation on PID Tuning]
 * [http://lorien.ncl.ac.uk/ming/pid/PID.pdf a paper on PID and tuning]
